explanation_ka:
ეს სიტყვები გამოიყენება კონტრასტის გამოსახატად — "მიუხედავად იმისა, რომ..."

Although / Even though + subject + verb:
Although it was raining, we went out.
მიუხედავად იმისა, რომ წვიმდა, გავედით.

Despite / In spite of + noun / -ing:
Despite the rain, we went out.
In spite of being tired, she kept working.

⚠️ Despite-ის შემდეგ ᲐᲠᲐᲡᲓᲠᲝᲡ "that" ან subject+verb!
არასწორი: Despite that it rained...
სწორი: Despite the rain... / Although it rained...

examples.en: Although she was tired, she went to the gym.
examples.ka: მიუხედავად იმისა, რომ დაღლილი იყო, სპორტდარბაზში წავიდა.

examples.en: Despite the cold, they went swimming.
Even though I studied hard, I failed.
examples.ka: მიუხედავად იმისა, რომ ბევრი ვისწავლე, ჩავჭერი.

examples.en: In spite of being late, he wasn't worried.
Although it's expensive, it's worth it.

common_mistakes_ka: ყველაზე ხშირი შეცდომა: "Despite that he was tired" — არასწორია! Despite-ის შემდეგ noun ან -ing უნდა: "Despite being tired" ან "Despite his tiredness". თუ გინდათ subject+verb, გამოიყენეთ although.

exercises.question: ___ the bad weather, we had fun.
___ she was nervous, she gave a great speech.
In spite of ___ sick, he came to work.
___ though it was late, she kept studying.
